an3.155:1.1: “Ye, bhikkhave, satta pubbanhasamayam kayena sucaritam caranti, vacaya sucaritam caranti, manasa sucaritam caranti, supubbanho, bhikkhave, tesam sattanam.
an3.155:2.1: Ye, bhikkhave, satta majjhanhikasamayam kayena sucaritam caranti, vacaya sucaritam caranti, manasa sucaritam caranti, sumajjhanhiko, bhikkhave, tesam sattanam.
an3.155:3.1: Ye, bhikkhave, satta sayanhasamayam kayena sucaritam caranti, vacaya sucaritam caranti, manasa sucaritam caranti, susayanho, bhikkhave, tesam sattananti.
